synopsis.text: In a twist of fate, Nie Li, once a formidable Demon Spiritist who met his end in a fierce battle against a Sage Emperor and divine beasts, finds himself reincarnated as his 13-year-old self. Despite being the weakest in his class with a mere red soul realm, he harbors an indomitable spirit and an extensive wealth of knowledge from his past life. With this new lease on life, he vows to protect his beloved city, family, friends, and lover from the impending doom of demon beast assaults and the treachery of the Sacred family. Armed with powerful cultivation techniques and formidable demon spirits, Nie Li embarks on a journey to become the strongest Martial Artist and avenge his past. As he ascends to the pinnacle of power, he aims to rewrite history and settle old scores, determined to become an invincible King of Gods.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
